EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.10 - Implied Consent - Catalogue Survey Reminder.Implied Consent - Catal
EmailTemplate.subject: Just A Heads Up, We Still Want To Hear From You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, We value your opinion and really want to hear from you.
Did you receive a 2018/2019 printed Grand & Toy catalogue? Even if you didn’t, we’d love to hear from you. Take our survey to let us know what you think, every response helps make our resources the best they can be.
It should only take a few short minutes of your time to complete.
Thanks in advance.
